org.doctag.domain

Class Tax

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.doctag.domain.Tax

extends Object
    Representation of a tax inside a docTag document.

    Jochen Schalanda
    See Also:
    "docTag specification 0.5, section 2.2.1"
